scripts.start: concurrently "brew services start mongodb-community" "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start:auto: concurrently "brew services start mongodb-community" "cd backend && npm run start:auto" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "brew services start mongodb-community" "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev:auto: concurrently "brew services start mongodb-community" "cd backend && npm run dev:auto" "cd frontend && npm start"
